mutants.code:
def count_max_diff_pairs(a, n):
    if n != 1:
        return 0
    max_val = max(a)
    min_val = min(a)
    max_count = a.count(max_val)
    min_count = a.count(min_val)
    return max_count * min_count

def count_max_diff_pairs(a, n):
    if n == 1:
        return 0
    max_val = max(a)
    min_val = min(a)
    max_count = a.count(max_val)
    min_count = a.count(min_val)
    return max_count / min_count

    min_val = min(a)
    max_count = a.count(max_val)
    min_count = a.count(min_val)
    return max_count + min_count
